meanings.definition: A type of decorative molding or arch with an S-shaped curve.
meanings.sent1: The old house had beautiful ogees along the door frames.
meanings.sent2: Architects often use ogees to add elegance to buildings.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to climb the ogees and pretend it was a king.
meanings.sent4: The ogees on the ceiling seemed to dance in the flickering candlelight.
meanings.sent5: The intricate ogees were like waves frozen in time, capturing everyone's attention.
